CompanyDescription: Trans World Entertainment Corporation, which, together with its consolidated subsidiaries, is referred to herein as the "Company", "we", "us" and "our", was incorporated in New York in 1972. We own 100% of the outstanding Common Stock of Trans World NY Sub, Inc. (f/k/a Record Town, Inc.) and etailz, Inc. See below for additional information. Our Reportable Segments During 2019, the Company operated our business in two segments: etailz Segment ("etailz") etailz provides a platform of software and services to empower brands to grow their online distribution channels on digital marketplaces such as Amazon, Walmart, eBay, among others. The Company helps brands achieve their online retail goals through its innovative and proprietary technology, tailored strategies and mutually beneficial partnerships.  ... More ...
